name: Chimichurri La Portena
keywords: garlic, parsley, red pepper flakes, raw, summer
recipeIngredient: 1 bunch fresh Italian parsley (about 1/2 cup, firmly packed)
1 large head garlic (about 13 large cloves), peeled and finely minced

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all ingredients in the bowl of a food processor, and pulse until finely chopped (or chop by hand).
Pour sauce into a glass container, and refrigerate until needed. Serve at room temperature.
